metadata.subject: Industrial safety
metadata.title: X-treme safety : survival tips for rookies in the workplace
metadata.creator: Alberta. Alberta Human Resources and Employment
metadata.publisher: Edmonton, Alta. : Alberta Human Resources and Employment
metadata.description: Available also on-line through the Alberta Learning Information Service (ALIS) at : www.alis.gov.ab.ca/careershop

This booklet is about workplace safety for a young (15-24 years of age) workers. Topics include a list of common risk factors, physical, biological and chemical hazards, unsafe work, employer's responsibilities

This booklet is about workplace safety for a young (15-24 years of age) worker. Topics include a list of common risk factors, physical, biological and chemical hazards, unsafe work, employer's responsibilities
Approved for use in Alberta schools
